text: Peristernia iniuensis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== P. iniuensis has been found in the Cook Islands and in Polynesia. ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1891
title: Peristernia iniuensis
